import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Remove room from user"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/{UserId}/rooms/{LocationRoomId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes a specific room assignment from a user's profile. Room assignments determine which physical rooms a user is associated with for ticket routing and location-based filtering.

**Prerequisites**
1. **UserId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/search/global-search) with entity type 'User'. Extract `Item.Users[].UserId`.
2. **LocationRoomId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/users/rooms/get](/docs/api/users/get-user-rooms) to list assigned rooms. Extract `Items[].LocationRoomId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search users: [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/search/global-search) → extract UserId
2. List rooms: [POST /api/v1.0/users/rooms/get](/docs/api/users/get-user-rooms-bulk) with UserId → find LocationRoomId to remove
3. Remove room: DELETE this endpoint

**Notes**: Other room assignments for the user remain unchanged. Use [POST /api/v1.0/users/\{UserId\}/rooms/\{LocationRoomId\}](/docs/api/users/add-room-to-user) to add rooms.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"UserId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"User identifier.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"51c89694-ae9f-f011-8e61-6045bd7991ab"},{"name":"LocationRoomId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Room identifier to remove.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"a1b2c3d4-5678-90ab-cdef-123456789012"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
